definition: owner/master/host/individual or party concerned/God/Lord/main/to indicate or signify/trump card (in card games)

sentences.english: Get up, Captain and open the door, and you will find the fog gone.
sentences.chinese: 起来，船主把门打开，你要看见雾已经全消了。

sentences.english: But the centurion believed the pilot and the master of the ship, more than those things which were said by Paul.
sentences.chinese: 可是，百夫长宁信从舵手和船主，不听保禄所说的话。

sentences.english: Local ship owners say a few survivors were pulled from the waters.
sentences.chinese: 当地船主说，有一些生还者被救起。

sentences.english: The ship's owner is the four Yemenis have been arrested.
sentences.chinese: 这艘船的船主是4名也门人，已遭到警方逮捕。

sentences.english: Nevertheless the centurion believed the master and the owner of the ship, more than those things which were spoken by Paul.
sentences.chinese: 但百夫长信从掌船的和船主，不信从保罗所说的。

sentences.english: The European Union Naval Force says the 14-member crew was reported missing by the boat's owner Thursday.
sentences.chinese: 欧盟海军说，船主星期四报告有14名船员失踪。

sentences.english: For now, however, the billionaire yacht owners of the world will have to fight for parking spaces.
sentences.chinese: 然而眼下，全世界的亿万富豪船主们还是得争抢泊位。

sentences.english: Boat-owner Peter Overschmidt has agreed not to lock his boat away for the winter.
sentences.chinese: 该明轮船船主彼得已同意在冬天不将该船锁藏起来。

definition: person who lives and makes a living on a boat/boatman/boat dweller
